page.title: 12TELEVISION, VIDEO, COMPUTERS
page.content: {TELEVISION : Viewing Times (%) { Hrs./Week: 0 1-10 11-20 21-30 >50 { BBC 1 7 53 38 4 5 { BBC 2 11 89 0 0 0 { ITV 14 1 24 9 3 { CH. 4 __ Not yet available __ {VIDEO RECORDERS} Use of home videos has grown rapidily in the last few years. 39% of all families presently have one. 61% of them regularly view hired films. {HOME COMPUTERS} In only four years, the computer has gained a place in 30% of families' homes, of which 97% are used to play games, 77% for educational use and 13% for business. Nearly all were British- made,but 13% were made in the U.S.A. Spectrum : 42% Sinclair ZX81 : 13% Electron : 16% Commodore V20 : 13% Acorn-BBC: 13% Commodore 64 : 3%
